column4: have her try the test call with the skype bot. if that works then she is good to go and you know it is on your end. if the test call fails well then you trouble shoot
yeah, her skype worked from a windows box, but not from her jaunty box
the skype website has some sound work arounds but I would read the link ubottu sent you first and see
I had an issue with sound when not using a headset. getting a headset fixed the problem right away
